com.henrikhedberg.util

Class BufferInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.henrikhedberg.util.BufferInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class BufferInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
    An InputStream that contains an internal buffer to enable communication between thread boundaries.

    A consumer thread uses the standard InputStream interface (read(), close()) to take buffered bytes.

    A producer thread sets a handler with the setHandler(Handler) method to read the buffered bytes from an other InputStream with the readFrom(InputStream) method. The end() method may be used to mark the end of file (EOF).

    Version:
    1.0 (20150503)
    Author:
    Henrik Hedberg <henrik.hedberg@iki.fi>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  BufferInputStream.Handler
      A handler that is called when the specified BufferInputStream has run out of bytes or has been asked to close itself.
